entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 31 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming north 20 km/h early this morning. Temperature falling to minus 31 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 44 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind north 30 km/h. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 44 this evening and minus 53 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 29.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Blowing snow at times. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 29. Wind chill minus 53 in the morning and minus 46 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023
